function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced funding for sustainable development goals due to COVID-19 crisis","Impact":"Limited search for sustainable solutions and development goals","Mitigation":"Seek alternative sources of funding, prioritize sustainable initiatives, and raise awareness of the importance of sustainability","Technologies":"Fundraising platforms, crowdfunding, sustainable financing models","People":"Population in poor regions or countries, public health at risk","Owner":"Governments, NGOs, international organizations"},{"Description":"Emphasis on private vehicle travel over public transport due to COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Potential increase in viral transmission and environmental pollution","Mitigation":"Invest in active mobility, teleworking, and touch-free digital technologies to reduce reliance on private vehicles and public transport","Technologies":"Electric vehicles, telecommuting tools, touch-free interfaces","People":"Public health at risk, communities relying on public transport","Owner":"Transport authorities, employers, technology companies"}]}
